short_summary: Supplies and deliveries of three (3) Standby Electrical Generators with automatic transfer switches and standalone enclosures to operate visitor services infrastructure in Jasper National Park.
description: A complex of visitor services infrastructure for Jasper National Park Maintenance compound must be powered during times of main power outage. ",

### Tender Description

Tender for the supply and delivery of three (3) Standby Electrical Generators with automatic transfer switches and standalone enclosures for powering visitor services infrastructure during times of main power outage. Deliverables should meet specifications outlined in Annex Basis of Payment. Mandatory Technical Evaluation Criteria can be found in Annex Mandatory Technical Evaluation Criteria.

*   The following **UNSPSC Classification** is relevant to this procurement:

    *   UNSPSC: *26111600* 
    *   Description (3 languages): *Power generators*
